title: Chris Ducker - Upgrade Your Freedom and Bank Account
itunes:title: Chris Ducker - Upgrade Your Freedom and Bank Account
description:
A strong personal presence is the lifeblood of the entrepreneur's work. How you show up determines who you attract, what others say about you when you're not around, and how able you'll be to move smoothly from one business venture to the next. So, how much attention are you paying to your personal branding?
 
Chris Ducker has been scratching the entrepreneurial itch since his teen years. A self-proclaimed "sales and marketing guy" with years of experience under his belt, Chris now lends his talents and his insight to his career as a speaker, author, coach, and founder of Youpreneur, which exists to help entrepreneurs zero in on the best personal branding for them.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Zach and Chris dive deep on the staying power of well-developed personal branding, the 3 Lists to Freedom exercise (as well as the resulting impact) and strategies for staying present and keeping family at the top of the priority list. Keep listening to hone in on the value you bring to the table.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/chris-ducker/
 
Get More Involved:

  3. Join The Elite Underdog Alphas With The Free Underdog Report: https://underdogempowerment.com/report
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
